cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 60 miles southwest of Ponce, Puerto Rico
cyclone.trajectory: Moving west-northwest across Hispaniola and Cuba then forecast to curve into the north-west Gulf of Mexico toward the Louisiana / upper-Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-west Gulf Coast (likely Louisiana or upper Texas coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Central Bahamas; Cuban provinces of Las Tunas, Holguin, Guantanamo, Santiago de Cuba, and Granma
weather_observation.warning_coast: Puerto Rico (including Vieques & Culebra), U.S. Virgin Islands, northern & southern coasts of the Dominican Republic, northern coast of Haiti, southeastern Bahamas, Turks and Caicos Islands
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Greater Antilles (Puerto Rico, Hispaniola, Cuba), Bahamas, Florida Keys, and the north-west Gulf Coast from southeast Texas to Mississippi
weather_observation.expected_closest_date_to_port: Not expected to approach Kansas City within 5-day forecast
